attributes.action: Remove the speaker of the houses of parliament because he is not impartial
attributes.additional_details: Just take a look at the amendments that he slected for the indictive votes and constantly side with remainer mps in the house
attributes.background: The speaker of the houses of parliament is supposed to b impartial mr bearcow is clearly anti brexit he is time and time again undermining democracy and he should b removed and replace immediately

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
